data.eml:eml: Lobithelphusa mexicana Rodriguez, 1982 (Decapoda: Pseudothelphusidae): a reassessment of key characters and systematics

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Villalobos-Hiriart, José Luis, Kamanli, Seyit A., Álvarez, Fernando, Garbout, Amin, Clark, Paul F. (2019): Lobithelphusa mexicana Rodriguez, 1982 (Decapoda: Pseudothelphusidae): a reassessment of key characters and systematics. Zootaxa 4586 (1): 151-161, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4586.1.8
